p: “Moreover, releases of mosquitoes artificially infected with the intracellular endosymbiont Wolbachia, which can make infected males incapable of successfully mating with uninfected females in an SIT-like manner and can inhibit mosquito infection with pathogens such as DENV and ZIKV(Aliota et al., 2016;Walker et al., 2011), have also been carried out to either suppress mosquito populations or make them less likely to transmit pathogens, and may hold promise for reducing incidence of disease(Moreira et al., 2009; Schmidt et al., 2017).”
